resources.string: We just sent a verification code to your email
We just sent a verification code to your phone
We just sent a verification code to your new email address
We just sent a verification code to your new phone
Enter the code we sent to you at %1$s to register. The code will expire after 10 minutes.
Enter the code we sent to you at %1$s to log in. The code will expire after 10 minutes.
Enter the code we sent to you at %1$s to reset. The code will expire after 10 minutes.
Enter the code we sent to you at %1$s to change your withdrawl password. The code will expire after 10 minutes.

Enter the code we sent to you at %1$s to rebind. The code will expire after 10 minutes.

Enter the code we sent to you at %1$s to freeze the account. The code will expire after 10 minutes.
Enter the code we sent to you at %1$s to unfreeze your account. The code will expire after 10 minutes.
